name: Aloo Parantha
description: Fluffy wheat bread stuffed with spiced potatoes, served with cool raita (yogurt) and pickle.

name: Gobi Parantha
description: A delicious parantha filled with seasoned cauliflower, served with a side of raita and pickle.

name: Mix Parantha
description: A hearty parantha stuffed with a medley of mixed vegetables, served with raita and pickle.

name: Chat Papri
description: Crisp papri wafers loaded with potatoes, chickpeas, and topped with yogurt, tangy tamarind, and spicy mint chutneys.

name: Samosa Chana Chaat
description: Crushed savory samosas topped with a flavorful chickpea curry, sweet and tangy chutneys, and fresh cilantro.

name: Aloo Tikki Chana Chaat
description: Crisp potato patties served with a warm, spiced chickpea curry, topped with a mix of chutneys and yogurt.

name: Veg Samosa
description: A flaky pastry triangle filled with a delicious mixture of spiced potatoes and peas. Price is per piece.

name: Chicken Samosa
description: A deep-fried pastry triangle filled with a savory blend of minced chicken and spices. Price is per piece.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: A spicy and savory mixed vegetable mash served with soft buttered buns (pav), a classic street food delight.

name: Fish Pakora
description: Tender fish fillets seasoned with aromatic spices, battered in chickpea flour, and deep-fried to a golden crisp. Price is per pound.

name: Tandoori Chicken Momos
description: Juicy chicken dumplings marinated in yogurt and spices, then grilled to a smoky perfection in the tandoor. Served as an 8-piece portion.

name: Steam Momos
description: Delicately steamed dumplings filled with a savory mixture. Served as an 8-piece portion.

name: Masala Fries
description: Crispy French fries tossed in a unique blend of tangy and spicy Indian masala.

name: Boondi Raita
description: A cooling yogurt-based side dish mixed with crispy fried gram flour balls (boondi) and a touch of roasted cumin.

name: Plain Raita
description: A simple and refreshing yogurt-based side dish, perfect for complementing spicy curries.

name: Onion Salad
description: A zesty salad of thinly sliced fresh onions mixed with a blend of herbs, lemon juice, and spices.

name: Chicken Wrap
description: Tender chicken pieces wrapped in a warm flatbread with fresh vegetables and a light sauce.

name: Goat Wrap
description: Savory, slow-cooked goat wrapped in a warm flatbread with fresh vegetables and our signature sauce.

name: Fish Wrap
description: Crispy fish pakora wrapped in a warm flatbread with fresh salad and a tangy dressing.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: A fragrant and flavorful basmati rice dish cooked with tender chicken pieces, layered with aromatic spices.

name: Goat Biryani
description: Layers of slow-cooked basmati rice and succulent bone-in goat, infused with a rich blend of spices.

name: Veg Biryani
description: Basmati rice cooked with a variety of fresh vegetables and exotic spices, making for a delicious and aromatic dish.

name: Aloo Gobhi
description: A classic vegetarian dish of cauliflower and potatoes saut√©ed with ginger, garlic, and Indian spices.

name: Mix Vegetables
description: A colorful medley of seasonal vegetables cooked in a mild and flavorful masala gravy.

name: Daal Makhani
description: A rich and creamy lentil dish made with slow-cooked black lentils in a buttery, tomato-based sauce.

name: Chana Masala
description: Tender chickpeas simmered in a tangy onion-tomato curry with a blend of traditional spices.

name: Aloo Dry
description: A simple yet delicious stir-fry of potatoes tossed with cumin, turmeric, and fresh herbs.

name: Veg Thali
description: A complete vegetarian meal featuring a selection of two daily curries, served with basmati rice, warm naan, and a sweet dessert.

name: Plain Basmati Rice
description: Fragrant and perfectly steamed long-grain basmati rice, an ideal accompaniment to any curry.

name: Veg Fried Rice
description: Indo-Chinese style fried rice with finely chopped vegetables and a savory sauce.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender pieces of chicken simmered in a creamy, mildly spiced tomato-based gravy.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A traditional homestyle chicken curry cooked with a medium-spiced blend of Indian masalas.

name: Goat Curry
description: Slow-cooked bone-in goat pieces in a rich, aromatic, and savory curry sauce.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken chunks served in a spiced, creamy tomato and cashew-based sauce.

name: Chicken Vindaloo
description: A fiery and tangy Goan-style curry with tender chicken pieces, made with a blend of vinegar, chili, and garlic.

name: Chicken Kadhai
description: Tender chicken cooked with bell peppers, onions, and traditional spices in a rich, aromatic sauce.

name: Chicken Lababdaar
description: A delicious curry of chicken stir-fried with onions, bell peppers, and a rich, creamy tomato gravy.

name: Goat Vindaloo
description: A bold and spicy curry with tender goat pieces, prepared with a fiery mix of vinegar, garlic, and chilies.

name: Goat Kadhai
description: Succulent goat pieces cooked with bell peppers and traditional masalas for a flavorful, semi-dry curry.

name: Spicy Garlic Chicken
description: Tender chicken tossed in a fiery garlic sauce with a hint of red chili and bell peppers.

name: Lemon Chicken
description: Zesty lemon-marinated chicken cooked in a light and refreshing masala gravy.

name: Chilli Chicken
description: An Indo-Chinese favorite with crispy chicken pieces stir-fried with green chilies, onions, and a tangy soy-based sauce.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then traditionally cooked in a tandoor (clay oven) for a smoky flavor and tender texture.

name: Chicken Naan Kabob
description: Grilled chicken skewers served with fresh naan and a variety of flavorful chutneys.

name: Chicken Roti
description: A savory chicken curry served inside a warm, soft roti wrap.

name: Butter Chicken Meal
description: A complete meal with our creamy butter chicken, served with a portion of basmati rice and a warm naan.

name: Chicken Curry Meal
description: Our traditional chicken curry meal, served with fragrant rice and fresh naan.

name: Goat Curry Meal
description: A hearty meal of tender goat curry, served with basmati rice and fresh naan.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala Meal
description: A complete meal featuring our smoky chicken tikka masala, served with rice and warm naan.

name: Non-Veg Thali
description: A grand platter featuring a selection of two meat curries, served with rice, naan, and a sweet dessert.

name: Chickpea Curry Meal
description: A satisfying vegetarian meal featuring our savory chickpea curry, served with basmati rice and naan.

name: Aloo Gobhi Meal
description: Our delicious aloo gobhi dish, served as a meal with basmati rice and naan.

name: Mix Veg Meal
description: A wholesome meal of our mixed vegetable curry, served with basmati rice and warm naan.

name: Daal Makhani Meal
description: A rich and creamy daal makhani meal, served with basmati rice and a soft naan.

name: Tawa Roti
description: A traditional homemade flatbread cooked on an iron griddle, soft and perfect for soaking up curries.

name: Tandoori Roti
description: Whole wheat bread baked in a hot clay oven for a rustic and slightly smoky flavor.

name: Plain Naan
description: A classic white flour bread, baked fresh in the tandoor to be soft and fluffy.

name: Garlic Naan
description: A soft naan bread topped with fresh minced garlic and cilantro, baked in the tandoor.

name: Butter Naan
description: Our classic tandoor-baked naan, brushed with a generous amount of melted butter.

name: Bhatura
description: A large, deep-fried fluffy bread, commonly served with chickpea curry (chana).

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft, deep-fried milk balls soaked in a sweet rose-cardamom syrup. Served as a 2-piece portion.

name: Carrot Pudding (Gajar Halwa)
description: A traditional Indian dessert of sweet shredded carrots slow-cooked with milk, sugar, and nuts.

name: Water
description: A bottle of refreshing, clean water.

name: Pop (Can)
description: Your choice of classic soft drinks in a can.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A sweet and creamy yogurt-based drink blended with ripe mango pulp.

name: Salted Lassi
description: A savory and tangy yogurt drink flavored with roasted cumin and a touch of salt.

name: Sweet Lassi
description: A classic sweet yogurt drink, lightly flavored with sugar and rose essence.
